name: Football championship - Soccer fever and champions league of soccer stars
name_original: Football championship - Soccer fever and champions league of soccer stars
description:
Hey Friends! Are you up for the football battle? Now you don’t need anyone to play with, compete with yourself by scoring higher and higher. That’s indeed the biggest challenge of all. Tap the ball to get it roll through the goals and score as much as you can. You will crave to play this game again and again to beat your best score, because this is “Highly Addictive”. Also share it with your friends and ask them to beat you on that. So what are you waiting for and download it now for free. Enjoy!!!

HOW TO PLAY:
======================
• Tap right and left to control the ball
• Get the ball roll through the goals
• Avoid any accident with the characters and the walls because it ends the game
• Compete with yourself to score higher and higher
• Share it with your friends and family and ask them to beat you on that

FEATURES:
======================
• Easy tap game play.
• Kids friendly content
• Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization
• Sharing on Facebook with friends & family
• Suitable for the whole family
• Cool BG music and HD graphics

=== YOU ARE SWEET ===
Your support by good reviews and ratings would help us to always provide you with free and cool apps and games; so don’t hesitate to give good ratings and reviews. We always welcome your feedback and any cool ideas about our games, to improve continuously; you might be willing to share at playinkstudio@gmail.com

=== JOIN US ON FACEBOOK ===
There are some exclusive news, updates and secret tips and tricks for you about our games at facebook,
https://www.facebook.com/PizzaSandwichStand
https://www.facebook.com/playinkstudio

OK then enjoy & Good Bye!
